00024 #ifndef MULTIMARKER_H

00033 #include "Alvar.h"

00040 namespace alvar {
00041 
00045 class ALVAR_EXPORT MultiMarker {
00046 protected:
00047         // The marker information is stored in all three tables using 
00048         // the indices-order given in constructor. 
00049         // One idea is that the same 'pointcloud' could contain feature 
00050         // points after marker-corner-points. This way they would be
00051         // optimized simultaneously with marker corners...
00052         std::map<int, CvPoint3D64f> pointcloud;
00053         std::vector<int> marker_indices; // The marker id's to be used in marker field (first being the base)
00054         std::vector<int> marker_status;  // 0: not in point cloud, 1: in point cloud, 2: used in GetPose()
00055 
00056         int pointcloud_index(int marker_id, int marker_corner, bool add_if_missing=false);
00057         int get_id_index(int id, bool add_if_missing=false);
00058 
00059         double _GetPose(MarkerIterator &begin, MarkerIterator &end, Camera* cam, Pose& pose, IplImage* image);
00060 
00061         int _SetTrackMarkers(MarkerDetectorImpl &marker_detector, Camera* cam, Pose& pose, IplImage *image);
00062 
00063 private:
00064 
00065         bool SaveXML(const char* fname);
00066         bool SaveText(const char* fname);
00067         bool LoadText(const char* fname);
00068         bool LoadXML(const char* fname);
00069 
00070 public:
00071 
00073         virtual void Reset();
00074 
00079         bool Save(const char* fname, FILE_FORMAT format = FILE_FORMAT_DEFAULT);
00080 
00085         bool Load(const char* fname, FILE_FORMAT format = FILE_FORMAT_DEFAULT);
00086 
00090         MultiMarker(std::vector<int>& indices);
00091 
00093         MultiMarker() {}
00094 
00103         template <class M>
00104         double GetPose(const std::vector<M>* markers, Camera* cam, Pose& pose, IplImage* image = 0)
00105         {
00106                 MarkerIteratorImpl<M> begin(markers->begin());
00107                 MarkerIteratorImpl<M> end(markers->end());
00108                 return _GetPose(begin, end,
00109                                                 cam, pose, image);
00110         }
00111 
00114         template <class M>
00115         double Update(const std::vector<M>* markers, Camera* cam, Pose& pose, IplImage* image = 0)
00116         {
00117                 if(markers->size() < 1) return -1.0;
00118 
00119                 return GetPose(markers, cam, pose, image);
00120         }
00121 
00124         void PointCloudReset();
00125 
00132         void PointCloudCorners3d(double edge_length, Pose &pose, CvPoint3D64f corners[4]);
00133 
00139         void PointCloudAdd(int marker_id, double edge_length, Pose &pose);
00140 
00143         void PointCloudCopy(const MultiMarker *m);
00144 
00147         bool PointCloudIsEmpty() {
00148                 return pointcloud.empty();
00149         }
00150 
00152         size_t Size() {
00153                 return marker_indices.size();
00154         }
00155 
00163         void PointCloudGet(int marker_id, int point,
00164         double &x, double &y, double &z);
00165 
00169         bool IsValidMarker(int marker_id);
00170 
00177         template <class M>
00178         int SetTrackMarkers(MarkerDetector<M> &marker_detector, Camera* cam, Pose& pose, IplImage *image=0) {
00179     return _SetTrackMarkers(marker_detector, cam, pose, image);
00180         }
00181 };
